name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Scheduled Task Execution
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker created a scheduled task to run malicious scripts, facilitating persistence on the target system. It involves removing the scheduled task, killing the malicious script process, and scanning for additional threats.

action--2f3c005b-9b6a-4996-b3d6-47b1cf9f.name: Remove malicious scheduled task
action--2f3c005b-9b6a-4996-b3d6-47b1cf9f.description: Delete the malicious scheduled task to prevent it from executing again.

action--ad50b6e7-c0b8-4289-bad4-30658ecb.name: Kill malicious script process
action--ad50b6e7-c0b8-4289-bad4-30658ecb.description: Terminate any processes that are executing the malicious script.

loop--c50cd00e-fabb-4838-bf56-8bcdbc06c5.name: Scan for additional threats
loop--c50cd00e-fabb-4838-bf56-8bcdbc06c5.description: Continuously scan the system for additional threats until no malicious scripts are found.

action--c50cd00e-fabb-4838-bf56-8bcdbc06.name: Run additional threat scan
action--c50cd00e-fabb-4838-bf56-8bcdbc06.description: Perform a recursive scan of the system to find other possible threats.

update-variable--malicious_script_found.name: Check if malicious scripts are still found
